subject: Football
Decisions and Verdicts
lead_paragraph: The former Ohio State quarterback Art Schlichter, whose N.F.L. career was derailed by a gambling addiction, was charged with stealing more than $1 million from a 68-year-old woman in suburban Columbus.
snippet: The former Ohio State quarterback Art Schlichter, whose N.F.L. career was derailed by a gambling addiction, was charged with stealing more than $1 million from a 68-year-old woman in suburban Columbus.
